experience.title: Integration Software Engineer
description: Implemented JWT-based authentication for GitHub Actions to improve maintainability for over 300 enterprise projects
Developed an internal Golang-based API to support automation for handling product and service requests
Integrated Datadog with Composer instances to enable 33% faster response time to unhealthy instances

experience.title: Advanced Data Engineer
description: Assisted in data pipeline management for BI tooling and maintained SQL scripts for data analysis
Developed Airflow DAGs to improve data visibility and error tracing
Debugged Scala scripts for data changes and inconsistencies in product data pipelines

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Benchmarked XML file conversion times for CAD files, improving runtime by 40% by implementing faster methods and utilizing JSON format
Developed ThreeJS scripts to enhance web-based CAD file 3D editing features

projects.name: Ghost in the Shell: Runtime Prompting Framework
projects.description: Developed an experimental compiler pass and parallel runtime thread process rocess to analyze branch prediction, runtime bottle necks, and dynamic error detection using Python's tracing library and LLM API integrations.

projects.name: Demographic Prediction Using NLP Techniques
projects.description: Processed a local news dataset and applied various NLP techniques to predict demographics using multi-label classification. Used both simple classification and modern LLM techniques.

projects.name: Parallel Dynamic Theta*
projects.description: Implemented a parallel 2D graph traversal with a dynamic endpoint using OpenMP. Modified approximation heuristic and used over-decomposition of the traversal space to get speedups up to 50%
